sourcesContent:
<template>
  <Detail />
</template>

<script>
import Detail from "./detail/DetailContent.vue";

export default {
  name: "detail-page",

  data() {
    return {
      anime: {},
    };
  },
  components: {
    Detail,
  },
  created() {
    // var variables = {
    //   id: this.$route.params.animeId,
    // };
    console.log(this.$route.params.animeId);

    var query = `query {
  Media(type: ANIME, id: 15125) {
    id
    title {
      romaji
    }
    status
    description
    coverImage {
      extraLarge
    }
    season
    seasonYear
    meanScore
    genres
    popularity
    format
    season
    status
    seasonYear
    episodes
    duration
  }
}
`;
    // Define the config we'll need for our Api request
    var url = "https://graphql.anilist.co",
      options = {
        method: "POST",
        headers: {
          "Content-Type": "application/json",
          Accept: "application/json",
        },
        body: JSON.stringify({
          query: query,
        }),
      };
    fetch(url, options)
      .then((response) => response.json())
      .then((data) => {
        this.anime = data.data;
        console.log(this.anime);

      });
  },
};
</script>

<style></style>
